answer:
QUESTION

I was just wondering I know u cant read nafals during the time of zawaal or between Asar and Maghrib but can u read the quran or darood sharif, Thanks!

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

There is no time restriction for reciting Quran or Durood Shareef. One may recite Quran and Durood Shareef during zawaal and between Asr and Maghrib.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
Darul Iftaa
